product_name: Topeak BabySeat II with Disc Bike Rack
long_description: An innovative suspension, quick and secure rack attachment and customizable seating and harness make the Topeak BabySeat(TM) one of the best deals around. Disc-brake rear rack is included. Included tubular aluminum rear rack is disc brake compatible and features fast and easy BabySeat mounting and removal. Wraparound seat design with integrated, padded roll bar handle creates a cocoon of protection for baby; roll bar provides extra head protection and doubles as a carry handle. 6-point harness offers superior comfort and security. Adjustable footrests with toe straps keep small feet away from spinning wheels. Removable padding has an easy-to-clean surface. Dual steel spring suspension system between BabySeat and rack helps cushion child from bumps and jolts. Carries child up to 40 lbs. BabySeat racks are QuickTrack(TM) compatible with all MTX TrunkBags(TM) (sold separately) for extended versatility. Please note, this item is designed for 26 in., 27.5 in. (650B) & 700c wheels with disc brakes; it will not work with 29ers.
short_description: An innovative suspension, quick and secure rack attachment and customizable seating and harness make the Topeak BabySeat(TM) one of the best deals around. Disc-brake rear rack is included.
